Body:
if os.path.exists('/tmp/query_ogle2.txt'):
    os.remove('/tmp/query_ogle2.txt')
cmd = (
    'lcc prepare_query -o query_ogle2.txt  -p starid -r 1:100 -p field_num -r 1:10 -p target -r lmc -f q'
    )
sys.argv = cmd.split()
lcc_entry(path=os.path.join(os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__)), os.
    pardir, 'resources'))
assert os.path.exists('/tmp/query_ogle2.txt')
